Html:
Hello, does this tool supports on Windows Server 2008 R2 terminal services with Word 2010?
I installed it on the administrator session and it installed the addin under appdata\local\temp folder. I tried to search for the .vsto on c: or but can't find it.
I was thinking may be able to install it with a logon script with VSTOInstaller.exe /install, but since I can't find the .vsto file so I don't know how to do it
